name: Android endless runner game
body:
# Game like Temple runner

## Android using view and touch

### infinite word many items to avoid , nice game architecture

[GooglePlay link]( https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rhymes.client.gp.pigshotclone) 
Thief will travel and collect the stars. 

FEATURES...
CARTOON VISUALS - jump straight into Mick & Ralph's cartoon world!
UNIQUE GAMEPLAY - a zany fusion of platforming and physics.
BAGS OF CONTENT - 80 levels with score-based medals to earn.

![game](https://lh3.ggpht.com/V8_xNaLfgzLUDvudJFoUU1iWnKKC0cSLNLhPgCQjHap1-n13cBQcOxSSQrUpbFzrfA=w705)
Tags: racing game, run, fast paced jumping, Sky Travel with thief runner , fast, acrade, casual. AD free, Endless running game

Developed by Kishor datta gupta
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
